text: If you can please upvote this I am sure it would be super helpful for everyone <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-choose-sync-direction-between-HubSpot-Sandboxes-and/idi-p/542037#M99423>

I am using VSCode as my IDE, I have the HubL extension to work on my HubSpot projects. What are some other tools you guys use that boosted your productivity or are just some nifty tools to have? :slightly_smiling_face:
I’ve also noticed that the Prettier formatter doesn’t play nice with HubL syntax. Any idea on what formatter would be better?
